row.process:
:IF &typaudit# = "GLOBAL" UCYBDBRR -LE -B -A -C&CLIENT# -O&PATHAUDIT#\AUDITGLOBAL_&CLIENT#_&$PHYS_DATE_DD_MM_YYYY_d#_&$PHYS_TIME_HHMMSS#.txt -D1&DATE_START#000000 -D2&DATE_END#235959 : ELSE UCYBDBRR -LE -B -A -C&CLIENT# -F&typaudit# -O&PATHAUDIT#\AUDIT_&typaudit#_&CLIENT#_&$PHYS_DATE_DD_MM_YYYY_d#_&$PHYS_TIME_HHMMSS#.txt -D1&DATE_START#000000 -D2&DATE_END#235959 :ENDIF
@set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

row.pre_process:
! ACCESS - unauthorized accesses ! CANCEL - aborting tasks ! CREATE - creating new objects ! DELETE - deleting objects ! IMPORT - importing objects ! MOVE - moving objects ! OBJ_MOD - object modifications ! RENAME - renaming objects ! RESTART - restarting tasks ! RESTORE - restoring objects ! RUN_MOD - modifications at runtime ! START - starting tasks ! USER - successful user logons and logoffs !
:SET &typaudit# = &AUDIT#
:SET &DATE_END# = CONV_DATE("YYYY-MM-DD:&END#",YYYYMMDD) :SET &DATE_START# = CONV_DATE("YYYY-MM-DD:&START#",YYYYMMDD) :P &DATE_END# :P &DATE_START#

row.post_process:
! Gets the filename minus its txt extension
:IF &typaudit# = "GLOBAL"
: SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP", "argv [5] = *") : PROCESS &HND# : SET &RET# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&RET#, "-O") : SET &POS# = ADD(&POS#, 2) : SET &FILE# = STR_CUT(&RET#, &POS#) : SET &FILE# = STR_SUB(&FILE#, ".txt", "") : PRINT &FILE# : ENDPROCESS
:ELSE
: SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP", "argv [6] = *") : PROCESS &HND# : SET &RET# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&RET#, "-O") : SET &POS# = ADD(&POS#, 2) : SET &FILE# = STR_CUT(&RET#, &POS#) : SET &FILE# = STR_SUB(&FILE#, ".txt", "") : PRINT &FILE# : ENDPROCESS
:ENDIF
! Activates the zip and sending of the audit via this job
:SET &ACTJOB# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT("JOBS.WIN.GLOBAL_AUDIT#INTERACTIVE_ZIP", WAIT, , , , PASS_VALUES)
